title: Russia delivers worst attack this year to Ukraine’s power sector
summary_full: The president said he persuaded Russia’s Vladimir Putin to stop striking Ukraine’s energy grid during a frigid period, but missiles fell on Kyiv hours later.
summary_public: The president said he persuaded Russia’s Vladimir Putin to stop striking Ukraine’s energy grid during a frigid period, but missiles fell on Kyiv hours later.

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: Russia delivers worst attack this year to Ukraine’s power sector
